name: save_script
description: This saves a script to Isabelle's magical script toolbox for future use and execution.

Script Name.description: The name of the script, so Isabelle can recognize her genius or idiocy later on.

Script Description.description: A brief description of what the script does, just in case Isabelle forgets.

Script Code.description: The actual code of the script, containing all the magic or chaos.
